Attribute.Name: VersionInfo
Attribute.Description: Version of WorkWithPlus in which the user executed the Desing System Wizard

Attribute.Name: VersionInfoProduct
Attribute.Description: Last version of WorkWithPlus executed in this KB (used by the ImportNewObjectsAndUpdateTheme process)

Attribute.Name: SerializationFormat
Attribute.Description: Format used to serialize and deserialize variables (i.e. filters in Web Session, columns for Columns Selector).

Attribute.Name: TabsForParallelTransactions
Attribute.Description: Add tabular tabs to the view for parallel transactrions.

Attribute.Name: UseTransactionContext
Attribute.Description: Use navigation context for transaction insert parameters (e.g. adding an Invoice to a Customer).

Attribute.Name: AfterInsert
Attribute.Type: enum{Return to Caller;Go to View;Go to Selection;Stay in Transaction;Nothing}
Attribute.Description: Default action performed after inserting a record.

Attribute.Name: AfterUpdate
Attribute.Type: enum{Return to Caller;Go to View;Go to Selection;Stay in Transaction;Nothing}
Attribute.Description: Default action performed after updating a record.

Attribute.Name: AfterDelete
Attribute.Description: Default action performed after deleting a record.

Attribute.Name: EnableAuditing
Attribute.Description: Enable auditing

Attribute.Name: AuditingCondition
Attribute.Description: Condition to be considered before making auditing calls. For example '&Context.Audit = True'

Attribute.Name: AuditingLevels
Attribute.Type: enum{Only First Level;First and Second Levels}
Attribute.Description: Levels of the audited transactions to be considered in the auditing.

Attribute.Name: UpdateInstances
Attribute.Description: Update instances when changing the Instance Template

Attribute.Name: GenerateView
Attribute.Description: Generate view objects

Attribute.Name: GenerateSelection
Attribute.Description: Generate selection objects

Attribute.Name: Address
Attribute.Description: Domain to be considered as an Address.

Attribute.Name: Geolocation
Attribute.Description: Domain to be considered as a Geolocation.

Attribute.Name: URL
Attribute.Description: Domain to be considered as a URL.

Attribute.Name: Email
Attribute.Description: Domain to be considered as an Email address.

Attribute.Name: GeneratePrompt
Attribute.Description: Generate prompt objects

Attribute.Name: PromptImage
Attribute.Description: Image to be used in prompts for Filters Multiple.

Attribute.Name: FilterPromptFKInPK
Attribute.Description: Filter the foreign key attributes contained in the primary key.

Attribute.Name: FilterMultiplePromptImage
Attribute.Description: Image to be used in prompts .

Attribute.Name: DefaultAutoPrompt
Attribute.Description: If true, automatically generate prompts or DVelop Combo (based on 'Auto Prompt/DVelpo Combo type' property) to editable foreign keys.

Attribute.Name: ExcludeAutoComboDsc
Attribute.Description: If true, the attributes that are automatically set by the 'Auto DVelop Combo' as Description Attribute of a FK are no included in the default Web Form.

Attribute.Name: PromptEncryptURLParameters
Attribute.Type: enum{No;Session key;Site key;<Use Environment property>;<Do not update>}

Attribute.Name: CheckSelectedLines
Attribute.Description: If True, a condition will be added to check if at least one line is selected and if none the message configured in 'Labels->Error no line Selected' will be displayed.

Attribute.Name: MantainSelectedRowsWhenPageChanges
Attribute.PrettyName: Mantain selected rows when page changes
Attribute.Description: If Yes, it will mantain the selected row when changing from one page to other within the grid. Only applies for grids within a transaction instance

Attribute.Name: SelectAllPages
Attribute.Description: If True, when the user clicks the 'Select All' option, the records of all pages will be selected. Only applies if 'Mantain selected rows when page changes' = Yes

Attribute.Name: ReturnProcedure
Attribute.Description: If not Empty, the procedure to be call when Return is needed.

Attribute.Name: TabsOptionsSDT
Attribute.Description: SDT for the Tabs Options.

Attribute.Name: ConsiderShowInDefaultForm
Attribute.Description: If true, the attributes that has their property 'Show in Defualt Forms' = False will be invisibles by default.

Attribute.Name: IncludeAutomaticConditionsInDataSelector
Attribute.Description: If true, the Automatic Conditions will be included in the Data Selector (if the Data Selector is created), otherwise, they will be added directly in the WebPanel conditions.

Attribute.Name: ValidationMessageDisplay
Attribute.Type: enum{One at a Time;One at a Time (on the field);All at Once;All at Once (on the field)}
Attribute.Description: Configures whether if all validation messages in WebPanels should be displayed at the same time or not (using Is Required property).

Attribute.Name: TabPanelType
Attribute.Description: Configures whether the Tab Panels added in the instances will be DVelop controls or GXUI controls.

Attribute.Name: PanelType
Attribute.Description: Configures whether the Tab Panels added in the instances will be DVelop controls or GXUI controls.

Attribute.Name: PanelShowCollapseIcon
Attribute.Description: Configures whether to show the collapse icon or not in Panels. Applies only for Bootstrap DVelop Panels.

Attribute.Name: PanelCollapseIconPosition
Attribute.Description: Configures the position of the collapse icon in Panels. Applies only for Bootstrap DVelop Panels.

Attribute.Name: ConfirmPanelType
Attribute.Description: Configures whether the Tab Panels added in the instances will be DVelop controls or GXUI controls.

Attribute.Name: ActionGroupType
Attribute.Description: Configures whether the Action Groups will be DVelop controls, Combo Boxes or GeneXus Action Groups.

Attribute.Name: GridActionGroupType
Attribute.Description: Configures whether the Action Groups inside Grids will be DVelop controls or Combo Boxes.

Attribute.Name: helpTextDisplay
Attribute.Type: enum{Tooltip on Description;Tooltip on Value;Tooltip on Both;Information Icon}

Attribute.Name: helpTextThemeClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class to append to fields with help text.

Attribute.Name: DescriptionTooltipPosition
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@helpTextDisplay='Tooltip on Description' or @helpTextDisplay='Tooltip on Both']

Attribute.Name: ValueTooltipPosition
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@helpTextDisplay='Tooltip on Value' or @helpTextDisplay='Tooltip on Both']

Attribute.Name: UserControlsCompatibility
Attribute.Type: enum{Previous versions compatible;Responsive;Responsive (Based on container type)}

Attribute.Name: EditableGridForceNotSmooth
Attribute.Description: If true, the Grid Objects with 'Web User Experience=Use model property' that contains the StandardAction Insert, Update or Delete with InLine='True' will be forced to not use Smooth Web user experience

Attribute.Name: OptimizationNumber
Attribute.Description: This number is used to introduce or not the optimizations added by newer WorkWithPlus versions. If the highest value is set, all optimizations will be included.

Attribute.Name: WizardSaveInterval
Attribute.Description: Interval in seconds to Save the Wizard data when Resume property is 'Ask User' or 'Always'.

Attribute.Name: ControlName
Attribute.Description: Tab Control name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Description: Title to be shown as the tag of the tab.

Attribute.Name: ControlName
Attribute.Description: Tabs Control name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: Theme
Attribute.Description: Theme class.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Rule's name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: IsNullable
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the Nullable property matches this value.

Attribute.Name: IsForeignKey
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) a Foreign Key.

Attribute.Name: IsPrimaryKey
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) a Primary Key.

Attribute.Name: IsInferred
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) inferred.

Attribute.Name: IsFormula
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) a formula.

Attribute.Name: IsFirstLevel
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) first level of the transaction.

Attribute.Name: IsVisible
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the rule will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) visible in the form of the transaction.

Attribute.Name: RegularExpression
Attribute.Description: Defines to which attributes the rule will be applied. The tag <TRN_NAME> can be included in the Regular Expression.

Attribute.Name: Rule
Attribute.Description: Is the rule that will appear in the transaction. The following tags can be included in the rule: <TRN_NAME>, <TRN_DESCRIPTION>, <ATT_NAME>, <ATT_DESCRIPTION>, <PK_LIST>, <PK_VAR_LIST>, <FIRST_EDITABLE_ATTRIBUTE> and <FIRST_EDITABLE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_PK>.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Condition's name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: IncludeInDataSelector
Attribute.Description: If <default>, the general property 'IncludeAutomaticConditionsInDataSelector' will be considered.

Attribute.Name: IsNullable
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the condition will be added only if the Nullable property matches this value.

Attribute.Name: IsForeignKey
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the condition will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) a Foreign Key.

Attribute.Name: IsPrimaryKey
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the condition will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) a Primary Key.

Attribute.Name: IsInferred
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the condition will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) inferred.

Attribute.Name: IsFormula
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the condition will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) a formula.

Attribute.Name: IsFirstLevel
Attribute.Description: If not empty, the condition will be added only if the attribute is (or is not) first level of the transaction.

Attribute.Name: RegularExpression
Attribute.Description: Defines to which attributes the condition will be applied. The tag <TRN_NAME> can be included in the Regular Expression.

Attribute.Name: Condition
Attribute.Description: Is the condition that will appear in the transaction. The following tags can be included in the rule: <TRN_NAME>, <TRN_DESCRIPTION>, <ATT_NAME> and <ATT_DESCRIPTION>

Attribute.Name: DelBlock
Attribute.PrettyName: Behavior if Automatic Condition Node is not present on instance

Attribute.Name: ThemeObj
Attribute.Description: Name of the Theme object. If <Do not update>, the property will no be changed. If <Use model default> the property will be set to <Use model default>.

Attribute.Name: Button
Attribute.Description: Set the specified theme as the selected theme for every UserAction that its property ControlType is Button, and its property ButtonClass is empty

Attribute.Name: DisabledButton
Attribute.Description: Set the specified theme as the selected disabled button theme for every UserAction that its property ControlType is Button, and its property DisabledButtonClass is empty

Attribute.Name: ColumnsSelectorTable
Attribute.Description: Table that will surround the Free Style Grid, when the grid has its property Columns Selector as true.

Attribute.Name: ColumnsSelectorFreeStyleGrid
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the Free Style Grid, when the grid has its property ColumnsSelector as true.

Attribute.Name: Attribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for attributes.

Attribute.Name: ReadonlyAttribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for read-only attributes.

Attribute.Name: ReadonlyGridAttribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for read-only attributes used as grid columns.

Attribute.Name: BlobAttribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for blob attributes.

Attribute.Name: ReadonlyBlobAttribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for read-only blob attributes.

Attribute.Name: ReadonlyGridBlobAttribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for read-only blob attributes used as grid columns.

Attribute.Name: GridCheckBoxAttribute
Attribute.Description: Only for compatibility. Invisible.

Attribute.Name: RequiredThemesAssignation
Attribute.Description: If 'Fixed classes', the selected theme classes will be assigned to the fields and cells. If 'Use as prefix', the selected theme class will be concatenated with the field and cell theme class.

Attribute.Name: RequiredAttribute
Attribute.Description: Default class for checkbox attributes in grids.

Attribute.Name: RequiredAttributeDescription
Attribute.Description: Default class for required attributes description textblock.

Attribute.Name: RequiredAttributeCell
Attribute.Description: Default class for the cell of the required attributes.

Attribute.Name: RequiredAttributeDescriptionCell
Attribute.Description: Default class for the cell of the required attributes description textblock.

Attribute.Name: GXUIPanel
Attribute.Description: Default class for the Panel.

Attribute.Name: GXUITabs
Attribute.Description: Default class for the Tabs.

Attribute.Name: RangeMiddleText
Attribute.Description: Theme for the middle text in the range filters.

Attribute.Name: FilterOperator
Attribute.Description: Theme for the operator combo selector included in Filters with operators.

Attribute.Name: DynFilterTable
Attribute.Description: Theme for the table that contains the Dynamic Filters.

Attribute.Name: DynFilterPrefix
Attribute.Description: Theme for the label included as prefix in the Dynamic Filters.

Attribute.Name: DynFilterMiddle
Attribute.Description: Theme for the label included in the middle in the Dynamic Filters.

Attribute.Name: DynFilterSelector
Attribute.Description: Theme for the selector combo in the middle in the Dynamic Filters.

Attribute.Name: DynFilterFixedFilterDescription
Attribute.Description: Theme for the description of the fixed filters.

Attribute.Name: CharacterAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of character attributes.

Attribute.Name: VarcharAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of character attributes.

Attribute.Name: NumericAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of varchar attributes.

Attribute.Name: DateAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of date attributes.

Attribute.Name: DateTimeAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of datetime attributes.

Attribute.Name: ComboAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of combobox attributes.

Attribute.Name: RadioButtonAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of radio button attributes.

Attribute.Name: CheckBoxAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of check box attributes.

Attribute.Name: TotalizerAttribute
Attribute.Description: Suffix assigned to the class of totalizers for attributes and variables.

Attribute.Name: FSWithHeaderScrollSection
Attribute.PrettyName: Section (for scroll in FS with Header)

Attribute.Name: FSWithHeaderTitle
Attribute.PrettyName: Default Title (for scroll in FS with Header)

Attribute.Name: UserActionImageClass
Attribute.Description: Default class to be assigned to UserActions of type Image that are inside Grids

Attribute.Name: AllInCombo
Attribute.Description: Caption used for the All option in combos.

Attribute.Name: RecordNotFound
Attribute.Description: Text used on Views when the requested record is not found in the database.

Attribute.Name: RequiredAttribute
Attribute.Description: Message to show for required attributes. The special tags <Att_Name>, <Att_Description>, <Att_Title>, <Att_ColumnTitle> and <Att_ContextualTitle> can be used and will be replaced with the attribute property.

Attribute.Name: DisabledPopUpGridTextAction
Attribute.Description: Message to show when user clicks a grid action that has its control type button, is pop up is disabled. The special tag <Action_Name> can be used and will be replaced with the name of the action.

Attribute.Name: ConfirmTextYes
Attribute.Description: Text to show as 'Yes' option when an action has its confirmation option as true

Attribute.Name: ConfirmTextNo
Attribute.Description: Text to show as 'No' option when an action has its confirmation option as true

Attribute.Name: ConfirmTextCancel
Attribute.Description: Text to show as 'Cancel' option when an action has its confirmation option as true and its ConfirmType is 'YesNoCancel'

Attribute.Name: ComboCaption
Attribute.Description: Text to show in the combo

Attribute.Name: DVBCaption
Attribute.Description: Text to show in the DVelop Bootstrap Action Group

Attribute.Name: NoRecordSelected
Attribute.Description: Error to show when a multi-row action (or grid action placed outside the grid) is clicked and no record is selected in the grid.

Attribute.Name: PlainAttributeDescription
Attribute.Type: enum{Use description;Use title;Use contextual title;Use column title;<default>}

Attribute.Name: GridAttributeDescription
Attribute.Type: enum{Use description;Use title;Use contextual title;Use column title;<default>}

Attribute.Name: DynamicAttributeDescription
Attribute.Description: If False it will assign in the 'Description' property the description/title/contextual title of the attribute. If True it will assign a dynamic value that depends on the attribute itself (for example '=ATT.Description', 'ATT.ColumnValue')

Attribute.Name: DynamicVariableDescription
Attribute.Description: If False it will assign in the 'Description' property the description/title/contextual title of the attribute. If True it will assign a dynamic value that depends on the attribute itself (for example '=ATT.Description', 'ATT.ColumnValue')

Attribute.Name: DynFilterPrefix
Attribute.Description: Label included as prefix in the Dynamic Filters.

Attribute.Name: DynFilterMiddle
Attribute.Description: Label included in the middle in the Dynamic Filters.

Attribute.Name: ExportFullTextFilterDescription
Attribute.Description: Text to be used in Export and ExportReport procedures when the 'Full text filter' is included with 'Show desciption' = false.

Attribute.Name: ExportCFFDescription
Attribute.Description: Text to be used in Export and ExportReport procedures when a 'Conditional Formatting' filter is being applied.

Attribute.Name: groupCaption
Attribute.Description: The following tags can be used: <ATT_DESCRIPTION>, <ATT_NAME>, <ATT_VALUE_DSC> and <GROUP_COUNT>

Attribute.Name: groupByOption
Attribute.Description: Text to appear as a column option.

Attribute.Name: DynFiltersClearFilterVisibility
Attribute.Description: If Dynamic, the clear action will be visible only when the 'add' action is hidden.

Attribute.Name: operator
Attribute.Description: Filter Operator.

Attribute.Name: middleText
Attribute.Description: Text to appear in the middle label.

Attribute.Name: PagingType
Attribute.Type: enum{One page at a time;Infinite scrolling (form scroll bar);Infinite scrolling (grid scroll bar)}

Attribute.Name: SaveGridState
Attribute.Description: Remember filters and selected order in selection objects. The option 'In Session' will only save them on session. The option 'Custom' calls a procedure in which developer can do whatever he wants.

Attribute.Name: SaveGridStateInTabs
Attribute.Description: Remember current page, filters and selected order in Grid Tabs objects. The option 'In Session' will only save them on session. The option 'Custom' calls a procedure in which developer can do whatever he wants.

Attribute.Name: GridStateSDT
Attribute.Description: SDT for the GridState.

Attribute.Name: SaveGridCurrentPage
Attribute.Description: Remember current page in selection and Grid Tabs objects. Only applies if SaveGridState or SaveGridStateInTabs are 'true' respectively.

Attribute.Name: SaveGridLoadSaveCompatible
Attribute.Description: Includes code to Save and Load the grid state compatible with versiones prior version 8 (when saving the state in the Data Base). Only applies if SaveGridState or SaveGridStateInTabs are 'true' respectively.
Attribute.PrettyName: Save and Load Grid State Compatible

Attribute.Name: SendGridStateToProcedures
Attribute.Description: Specifies the way it will be sent the filters, orders, title filter information to the Export, Export Report, Column Selector and Export CSV procedures

Attribute.Name: ColumnSelector
Attribute.Description: If true a free style grid will be generated and an action that will allow the user to select the columns to be shown.

Attribute.Name: AllwaysCalculateRecordsCount
Attribute.Description: If false, the records count will only be calculated when necessary. Only applies to objects with columns selector.

Attribute.Name: AddColumnsColumnsSelector
Attribute.Type: enum{No;Yes (All invisibles);Yes (All visibles);Yes (based on property 'Visible by default')}
Attribute.Description: Specifies the way it will update the columns that have been added to grid, in previous configurations of columns

Attribute.Name: SaveGridColumnsState
Attribute.Description: Remember in session the columns and the order of them in selection objects.

Attribute.Name: AlwaysUseColumnTitleProperty
Attribute.Description: If true, when creating the instances, the description property of the attributes in the grid will be taken always from the ColumnTitle property. If false, when the attributes in the grids are not foreign keys nor inferred, the description will be taken from the ContextualTitle property.

Attribute.Name: ActionColumnsAutoresize
Attribute.Description: Action columns AutoResize property.

Attribute.Name: AttributeAutoresize
Attribute.Description: Attribute or Variable columns AutoResize property.

Attribute.Name: NotifyContextChange
Attribute.Description: Notify context change of grid. This only applies when property Allow Selection of grid is true

Attribute.Name: sortableByTitles
Attribute.Description: If true, the column titles will be clickable sorting the data by the column.

Attribute.Name: sortableByTitlesInFS
Attribute.Description: If true, the column titles will be clickable sorting the data by the column (when using FreeStyleGrid with 'Descriptions as headers'=true).

Attribute.Name: includeSortableByTitleInDropDownOptions
Attribute.Type: enum{Always;Only when DDO created for other options}
Attribute.DefaultValue: Only when DDO created for other options

Attribute.Name: selectionColor
Attribute.Description: Selection color of an item of the grid. This value can be the name of the color (Red, Black, etc.) or an RGB separated by commas (51, 51, 51).

Attribute.Name: hoveringColor
Attribute.Description: Hovering color of an item of the grid. This value can be the name of the color (Red, Black, etc.) or an RGB separated by commas (51, 51, 51).

Attribute.Description: Master page object name for view webpanels.

Attribute.Description: Master page object name for prompts.

Attribute.Description: Whether actions that are disabled due to a custom security check are shown as disabled or not shown at all.

Attribute.Type: enum{On Load;On Load and User Event}

Attribute.Description: Caption for buttons, and for grid column if no image is specified.

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether to include this action by default.

Attribute.Description: Image to be used for the action.

Attribute.Description: Theme class for the Image.

Attribute.Type: enum{On Web Panel load;On first click;On every click}

Attribute.Description: Caption for buttons, and for grid column if no image is specified.

Attribute.Description: Action tooltip.

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether to include this action by default.

Attribute.Name: ControlType
Attribute.Description: The control to include in the form. If the action is a grid action and 'Button' is selected, a variable will be included instead.

Attribute.Description: Image to be used for the action.

Attribute.Name: Behaviour
Attribute.Type: enum{Download Excel file;Upload to Google Drive}

Attribute.Name: GoogleDriveWebPanel
Attribute.Description: WebPanel to enter the data needed for the Google Drive upload.

Attribute.Name: BaseLocation
Attribute.Description: Base location for generated files (if a directory, include trailing slash).

Attribute.Name: UseExternalStorageProvider
Attribute.Description: If <default>, the Generator's property 'Storage Provider' will be considered.

Attribute.Name: ConsiderUserConditions
Attribute.Description: If true, the conditions added manually by the user in the Grid Object will be added in the Where condition of the Export.

Attribute.Name: FiltersColor
Attribute.Description: The number for the color of the filter titles (for information about the valid values, see GeneXus help about Color property in Excel Cells)

Attribute.Name: ColumnTitlesColor
Attribute.Description: The number for the color of the column titles (for information about the valid values, see GeneXus help about Color property in Excel Cells)

Attribute.Name: Template
Attribute.Description: File name of the template used when crearing the Excel spreadsheet (empty for no template).

Attribute.Name: StartRow
Attribute.Description: Initial row for data, when using a template file (can be any integer expression).

Attribute.Name: StartColumn
Attribute.Description: Initial column for data, when using a template file (can be any integer expression).

Attribute.Name: TotalizersFormat
Attribute.Description: The format of the totalizer cells separated by ';'. Possible values are: Italic, Bold, Underline and Color:<COLOR_NUMBER> (i.e: Italic;Bold;Color=RGB(221,75,57)

Attribute.Name: Title
Attribute.Description: The title of the export. The following tags can be included in the expression: <TRN_NAME>, <TRN_DESCRIPTION>, <TRN_DESCRIPTION_PLURAL>, <WW_CAPTION>

Attribute.Name: TitleColor
Attribute.Description: The number for the color of the title (for information about the valid values, see GeneXus help about Color property in Excel Cells)

Attribute.Name: ExportOnlyVisibleColumns
Attribute.Description: If true, the columns exported will be the one selected by user using ColumnsSelector. Only applies when the grid has ColumnsSelector enabled.

Attribute.Name: ConsiderUserConditions
Attribute.Description: If true, the conditions added manually by the user in the Grid Object will be added in the Where condition of the Export.

Attribute.Name: Template
Attribute.Description: Procedure to be used as the template for all reports (all print blocks and source will be included in each report)

Attribute.Name: LineHeight
Attribute.Type: enum{<Automatic>;1 row;2 rows;3 rows;4 rows;5 rows;6 rows;7 rows;8 rows;9 rows;10 rows}
Attribute.Description: If <Automatic>, the line height will be 3 rows if any column have more than 1 row in its height definition.

Attribute.Name: TitleFontSize

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: domain
Attribute.Description: Domain, Attribute, SDT or External Object on which the variable is based.

Attribute.Name: sdtItem
Attribute.Description: SDT Item type (Only valid if a SDT object is selected in Domain/Attribute/SDT property)

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Text for the combo. If <default>, the caption configured in the Configuration file (Labels) will be considered.

Attribute.Name: themeClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class. If empty, the property will be taken from the Configuration file.

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Action Name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: imageType
Attribute.Description: Image Type to be used in DVelop Bootstrap action group item.

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image to be used in DVelop Bootstrap action group.
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[name()!='gridActionGroup' and @type!='ComboBox' and @type!='GX Action Group' and @imageType='Image']

Attribute.Name: fontIconThemeClass
Attribute.VisibleIf: self::*[@type!='ComboBox' and @type!='GX Action Group' and (@imageType='Font icon' or name()='gridActionGroup')]

Attribute.Name: width
Attribute.Description: Column width. If 0, the column Autoresize property will be default

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Action description. If <default>, the description configured in the Configuration file (Labels) will be considered.

Attribute.Name: descriptionThemeClass
Attribute.Description: Description Theme class. If empty, the property will be taken from the Configuration file.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Action description. If <default>, the description configured in the Configuration file (Labels) will be considered.

Attribute.Name: descriptionThemeClass
Attribute.Description: Description Theme class. If empty, the property will be taken from the Configuration file.

Attribute.Name: gxobject
Attribute.Description: GeneXus object invoked for performing the Action.

Attribute.Name: condition
Attribute.Description: Condition to determine whether the action will be enabled. If the action is defined as "InGrid", the check will be performed for each record. If empty, the action will be available.

Attribute.Name: popup
Attribute.Description: Open the object in pop up

Attribute.Name: refreshAfterPopup
Attribute.Description: Execute a Refresh after the Popup is closed.

Attribute.Name: confirm
Attribute.Description: Confirmation before executing the event.

Attribute.Name: confirmMessage
Attribute.Description: Message of the confirmation message form.

Attribute.Name: confirmTitle
Attribute.Description: Title of the confirmation message form.

Attribute.Name: confirmType
Attribute.Description: Buttons to be shown in the con confirmation message.

Attribute.Name: SecFuntionKey
Attribute.Description: The Security Functionality Key used to check if the user has permission to execute this action (if <default>, WorkWithPlus will search for the Security Functionality Key defined in the object that is called and if empty no check will be done)

Attribute.Name: tooltip
Attribute.Description: Action tooltip.

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Action Name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: multiRowSelection
Attribute.Description: The action applies to multiple rows (a checkbox column will be added to grids). Only applies to actions outside grid.

Attribute.Name: multiRowSelectAll
Attribute.Description: If true, a 'select all' checkbox will be added to the multi-row selection column title. Only applies to grid actions with MultiRowSelection='True'.

Attribute.Name: mantainSelectedRowsWhenPageChanges
Attribute.PrettyName: Mantain selected rows when page changes

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Action Name. This property is used to identify the node in the Update Instances process.

Attribute.Name: includeAction
Attribute.Description: If <default>, the action will be included if the Configuration file is configured to do so.

Attribute.Name: ExportBehaviour
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;Download Excel file;Upload to Google Drive}
Attribute.Description: Behaviour. If <default>, the property in the configuration file will be considered.

Attribute.Name: PaperSize
Attribute.Description: Paper Size. To specify specific width and height values, use the following pattern: width;height. For example: 900;1200

Attribute.Name: PaperOrientation
Attribute.Description: Paper Orientation. This property will not be considered if specific values for width and height are specified in the Paper Size property.

Attribute.Name: LineHeight
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;1 row;2 rows;3 rows;4 rows;5 rows;6 rows;7 rows;8 rows;9 rows;10 rows}
Attribute.Description: If <default>, the property from the WorkWithPlus Settings will be considered.

Attribute.Name: InLine
Attribute.Description: Perform action in the grid (without going to the transaction).

Attribute.Name: retToSum
Attribute.Type: enum{<default>;Go to next step;Return to summary}
Attribute.Description: Action behavior when the current step is accessed from the 'Edit' action of the summary step.

Attribute.Description: GXtest Version.
